Generation V.Black: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
Generation V.White: Whatever it eats becomes fuel for the flame in its stomach. When it is angered, the intensity of the flame increases.
Generation V.Black 2: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
Generation V.White 2: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.

Generation VI.X: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
Generation VI.Y: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

Generation IX.Scarlet: When Pignite enters battle, its body temperature rapidly soars until Pignite itself is engulfed by a scorching fireball.
Generation IX.Violet: When defending its friends, Pignite will stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong. But it’s powerless when faced with an empty stomach.
